ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.message

Class OTREncodedMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.message.OTRMessage
      • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.message.OTREncodedMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataMessage, DHCommitMessage, DHKeyMessage, RevealSignatureMessage, SignatureMessage

    public abstract class OTREncodedMessage
extends OTRMessage

    This class encapsulates the various encoded messages that OTR handles.

    Each message consists of the 5 bytes "?OTR:", followed by the base 64 encoding of the binary data, ending with the byte ".".

    The following are considered OTR Encoded Messages:

    • Data Messages
    • D-H Commit Message
    • D-H Key Message
    • Reveal Signature Message
    • Signature Message
